test_message: I've connected my Google Merchant Center. Can you help optimize it?

actions_planned: Analyze your GMC product feed for errors, missing attributes, and optimization opportunities
Optimize product titles for clarity and search ranking
Complete missing product attributes (GTIN, brand, etc.)
Correct product images and add missing images
permission_request.estimated_improvements: Typically results in improved product visibility, higher ad approval rates, and better conversion potential.

next_actionables.action: Grant permission for autonomous GMC optimization
next_actionables.impact: Unlocks automated product enhancements and fixes for higher performance and compliance
steps: Allow agent to scan and optimize account

recommendations: Grant permission so I can analyze and optimize your Google Merchant Center product feed.
After approval, I will provide a detailed action plan and execute improvements automatically.
guided_workflows: Grant GMC Access & Run First Feed Optimization
Review Optimization Report & Fine-tune Automation Mode
